data.title: Cris Cyborg vs. Gabrielle Holloway: Date, start time, TV channel and live stream
data.meta_description:
Cris Cyborg makes her boxing debut on Saturday night.

The Brazilian MMA legend has been linked with a crossover fight against Katie Taylor bef...
data.text:
Cris Cyborg makes her boxing debut on Saturday night.

The Brazilian MMA legend has been linked with a crossover fight against Katie Taylor before the pair of them retire from combat sports, but first of all she needs experience in the ring.

Her first fight comes up against American Gabrielle Holloway, who also has an MMA track record, as well as a 0-2 boxing record.

Here's everything you need to know about Cyborg vs. Holloway.

When is Cyborg vs. Holloway? Date, start time

Date: Saturday, December 10

Preliminary Card: 5.30 p.m. ET / 10.30 p.m. GMT

Cyborg vs. Holloway ringwalks (approx): 9 p.m. ET / 4 a.m. GMT

The preliminary card is set to get underway at 5.30 p.m. ET / 10.30 p.m. GMT with the Cyborg vs. Holloway ringwalks scheduled for 8 p.m. ET / 3 a.m. GMT. These timings could change due to the length of the undercard fights.

What channel/stream is Cyborg vs. Holloway?

U.S. and ROW: BLK Prime

The fight will be broadcast on BLKPrime.com and through cable and satellite providers which provide the PPV service, at a price of $39.99.

Where is the Cyborg vs. Holloway fight?

The fight will be staged at the CHI Health Center in Omaha, Nebraska.

Cris Cyborg record and bio

Nationality: Brazilian

Date of Birth: July 9. 1985

Height: 5' 9"

Reach: 68"

Total Fights: 0

Record: 0

Gabrielle Holloway record and bio

Nationality : American

Date of Birth: April 15, 1990

Height: 5' 4"

Reach: N/A

Total Fights: 2

Record: 0-2 (0 KOs)

Cyborg vs. Holloway fight card
